name: Angry Zack
description:
The Viruses are taking over Tomatown and it's all up to you to find the vaccines and avoid the chaos .

Play the role of Zack, a brave tomato,  in this challenging journey and help him to take back control of his world.

This one-level game was made in about three days and it was the debut of kromia games in the gaming world. Enjoy it .
